Name: FFV PSP-Style Battle Sprites
Author: MtFujiInMyPants
Description:
This mod replaces the battle sprites and overworld sprites of the playable characters with versions modeled after the PSP release of FFIV: The Complete Collection.

.

I've been working on this mod for about 5 years off and on. And of course they delisted the game from Steam and announced the Pixel Remaster just as I finished it :-/ 

.

If anyone is interested in reading about its history, here's the mod page from Steam: https://steamcommunity.com/groups/ff-modding/discussions/9/343786746014121604/

.

I've also got an imgur gallery of all the sprites here: https://imgur.com/a/tzFQ5 and a video highlighting the overworld sprites in action here: https://youtu.be/k-p-yPGSBrM 
.

This mod looks best when played in the game's native resolution, 640x384 (Thanks to Saftle for discovering that) or 1280x768 and then upscaled using a lossless scaler. I'm using Magpie which is free.
